jdxi_editor.jdxi.file.utils
===========================

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: documentation_file_path(file_name: str) -> str

   documentation_file_path

   :param file_name: str The file name to return a path for the documentation file
   :return: str The file path


.. py:function:: os_file_open(file_name: str) -> None

   os_file_open

   :param file_name:  str
   :return: None
   Opens a file using default program from the OS
